com.epoch.db

Class InstitutionRW

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.db.DBCommon
      • com.epoch.db.InstitutionRW

  • public final class InstitutionRW
extends DBCommon
    Contains all database read and write operations pertaining to institutions. All methods are static.

      • getInstitution

        public static Institution getInstitution(String name)
                                  throws DBException
        Get institution with the given name.
        Parameters:
        name - the given name (must match exactly!)
        Returns:
        the institution, or null if there is no institution by that name
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

      • getGracePeriod

        public static int getGracePeriod(int id)
                          throws DBException
        Gets the number of days students at the institution can avoid paying for ACE.
        Parameters:
        id - the given id
        Returns:
        the number of days, or -1 if indefinite
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem reading the database

                                      throws DBException

        Parameters:

      • addInstitution

        static void addInstitution(Connection con,
                           Institution instn)
                    throws SQLException
        Adds a new institution to the database if it's not already in it.
        Parameters:
        con - database connection
        instn - institution to be saved, containing a name and an ID number of 0; method puts new ID number back into this object
        Throws:
        SQLException - if there's a problem writing to the database

      • setInstitutionStudentNumLabel

        static void setInstitutionStudentNumLabel(Connection con,
                                          Institution instn)
                                   throws SQLException
        Changes an institution's name for the student ID number, an institution's name for the systemwide username/login ID, and an institution's email domain.
        Parameters:
        con - database connection
        instn - institution whose name for the student ID number is being changed
        Throws:
        SQLException - if there's a problem writing to the database

                                  int gracePeriod)

        Sets the number of days students at an institution can avoid paying to use ACE.
        Parameters:
        instn - the institution
        gracePeriod - the grace period in days
        Throws:
        DBException - if there's a problem writing to the database
